definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: variegate (NH id.; so Ar. raqama, Eth. raqama:, cf. Targum [[רְקָם]], [[רִקְמָתָא]] variegated cloth or skin, Syr. tarqmoto0 freckles);—

definitions.title: Qal
